snippet.title: Pirates Journey Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
You and your crew have been shipwrecked on a tropical island in the late 1600s. At the beginning of the adventure, you find yourself with only a few basic supplies, including ropes, sticks, and stones. With skill and cunning, you can survive on the island and thrive as a pirate crew.

Pirates Journey Steam Page:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2099670/Pirates_Journey/

Pirates Journey Extended Early Access Trailer (4K)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0GqvxWopX9k
